name: Return to the Radiant Spaceways
description:
On the desert world once known as Earth, the final Worm Queen has spawned, disgorging her royal jelly to be feasted upon by the navigators of the Polychromacy. Using the hallucinogenic power of the jelly, they travel the lost roads between the worlds, delivering the Queen's newborn grubs to their intended noble houses. The time of isolation has ended. You must Return to the Radiant Spaceways

Return to the Radiant Spaceways is a downloadable one-page tabletop roleplaying game of far-out weirdness in the depths of space. Take the roles of a reckless pilot, a mysterious hive wanderer,  a crystalline paladin, or any of eleven different player character backgrounds. Deliver cute little baby space worms to strange space nobles! Get into esoteric debates about what a navigator matrix might be! The game system is inspired by '80's d6 dice-pools like the old Star Wars and Ghostbusters RPGs. Hopefully, it's fast-paced and easy to understand.
